story.text: The political contract is the contract we make with the institution of government, wherein we cede our individual sovereign power to responsible bodies. It is often called a [[Constitution]].

item.text: The political contract is the contract we make with the bureaucracy that helps guide us. It is often called a [[Constitution]].
The political contract is the contract we make with the institution of government, wherein we cede our individual sovereign power to responsible bodies
The political contract is the contract we make with the institution of government, wherein we cede our individual sovereign power to responsible bodies. It is often called a [[Constitution]].
